BlackStorm:

BlackStorm had calmed down before Maxima arrived, she stood up and 
looking at Hevn said "I'll be fine, cya soon Hevn" and lookinf at 
Maxima said "I'm ready... Let's go"

She follow Maxima, asking her self what wish Hydras for her



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima only looked at him without emotion. Then turned to 
Blackstorm to wait 
> for her. "Hydras has a special mission for Blackstorm. & that is 
all. For the 
> moment, remain here. I will return to escort you to hydras once I 
am finished 
> with Blackstorm's briefing."
> 
> Somehow, she had a feeling that Hevn wouldn't listen to her command.
